question: Technology major Facebook has proposed to expand which feature to Indian users in the near future?
explanation:
Social Media major Facebook had launched “Face Book News” in the USA. It has decided to expand this feature in India, UK, Germany, France and Brazil.
The company has also stated that it would pay for the content given to the company by news publishers. Facebook has proposed to associate closely with the popular news agencies and publishers in India to deliver better experience for its users.
